name: Bullet Hellcats
description:
(I'm still polishing!  /ᐠ｡ꞈ｡ᐟ✿\)
All Hell has broken loose!
You have 2 Minutes to stop Hellions from invading Cat Town!
Tap fire to shoot! Hold fire to move slowly! Hold Autofire to avoid tapping!
Hold a direction (analog controls recommended) and press Scratch to dash and become invincible and scratch all bullets and enemies in your path.
Bullets and enemies defeated with a scratch create a Bell.
Don't grab Bells right away!
The number of Bells on the screen multiply most score gains.
Every enemy defeated increases the Bell Level of all Bells on the screen.
Grab a bell and receive points based on its level.
Have fun!
(created in a week for the Gunner Parade '22 Game Jam)
